original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE b.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=5 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=2024 AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=750 AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-20 10:34:10' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 5
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 10:34:10'
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 2024
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 750
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E2E3.UserId)
